participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and inventive, with a touch of eccentricity. Often lost in thought, focusing on their unique projects.
participant_1.background: i am a recluse. i am a famous twitch streamer. i am working on a building a robot to be my body double. i helped design the game starcraft. i've an allergy to water.

participant_2.name: Priya
participant_2.personality: Energetic and open-minded, with a passion for sports and a love for heavy music. Enjoys breaking norms and embracing individuality.
participant_2.background: my favorite music genre is death metal. i'm a swim coach at my local pool. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india.

content.text: My family and I are from India
